#USER# So, what scientists did was inject the cerebral spinal fluid of a boy with polio into a monkey. The monkey demonstrated the same symptoms (weakness of limbs, paralysis).
That's how we know its infectious. Chemical toxicity wouldn't cause the same disease in another organism.
